text: Ministry of Transport and Maritime Economy of Poland () since 2001 has been included in the competence of the Ministry of Infrastructure. == Ministers of Transport and Marine Economy== * Franciszek Wielądek (PZPR) from 20 December 1989 to 6 July 1990 * Ewaryst Waligórski from 6 July 1990 to 5 June 1992 * Zbigniew Jaworski (ZChN) from 11 July 1992 to 26 October 1993 * Bogusław Liberadzki (SdRP) from 26 October 1993 to 17 October 1997 * Eugeniusz Morawski (UW) from 31 October 1997 to 8 December 1998 * Tadeusz Syryjczyk (UW) from 8 December 1998 to 8 June 2000 * Jerzy Widzyk (ZChN) from 12 June 2000 to 19 October 2001 ==External links== * Official government website of Poland Poland, Transport, Construction and Marine Economy Transport, Construction and Maritime Economy Poland, Transport, Construction and Maritime Economy Poland Poland Category:Transport organisations based in Poland Category:1989 establishments in Poland
title: Ministry of Transportation and Marine Economy (Poland)
